project_descr: Transition and Recovery Programme for North and North Eastern Uganda

outputs.output_descr:
1. Communities capacitated to benefit from local economic recovery programmes
2. Office of the Prime Minister, selected local governments and communities capacitated to effectively predict, prevent, respond and mitigate the impact of disasters.

1. UNDP capacity for Early Recovery coordination and support increased
2. A communication strategy for Early Recovery Cluster developed and implemented
3. Capacity of the local government to coordinate government recovery programmes strengthened
4. Fora of consultation of stakeholdrs involved in the recovery activities at national and regional level reguarly supported
5. Management information System established to document recovery interventions
6.Recovery activities and resources identified, harmonised and mapped
Strengthening Recovery, Reconciliation, Peace Building and Development in Northern Uganda.-CPAR
Communities capacitated to benefit from local economic recovery programmes
